original_text: And our hope for you is firm, because we know that just as you share in our sufferings, so also you share in our comfort.
korean_text: 너희를 위한 우리의 소망이 견고함은 너희가 고난에 참여하는 자가 된 것 같이 위로에도 그러할 줄을 앎이라

sentences.original_text: And our hope for you is firm
just as you share in our sufferings
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 우리의 고난에 동참하는 것 같이

sentences.original_text: so also you share in our comfort
